caseTitle: Mst. Rohaifa v. Federation of Pakistan through Secretary M/o Defence, etc
tagline: It is the responsibility of the respondents, Director-General ISI, Director-General MI and Judge Advocate-General JAG Branch, to comply with the order of the Court of the production of four detenus in letter and spirit. They as well as the Chief Secretary, Government of Khyber Pakhtunkhwa, who is the head of the Civil Administration over there are directed to ensure the production of these persons before this Court in safe custody without fail on 13-2-2012.
